TopicTitle: [KCT] ERROR! An error while KCT loading data occurred. Things will be seriously broken!

Articles.Content:
Help!!!

It happens often this problem. When I return to KSC I get the error as the title, and I have to restart Kerbal. Why?

I put my log files for experts

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_n0DdXfS_EDX2tMWm4yQnVTc2M/view?usp=sharing
